name: Bunker You Control
description:
Make sure your Hunger, Thirst, Sleep and Entertainment at 5! Click on the Bed to get Sleep, Click on the TV to get Entertainment, Click on the Apple to get Hunger and Click on the Cup to get Thirst! Walk into the Green Block to go to the next area of the Bunker! And Walk into the Red Block to get back to the Main Area!

A and D keys to move.

NOTE: This is just a small game I made for the fun of it so don't expect too much from it.
